name: start

commands_raw:
Nabella: I am just a normal maid.
---
Dalian: Do you have any ambitions?
---
Nabella: Honestly I don't really know what I want.
---
Nabella: I think I'm very confortable living like this.
---
Dalian: Someone just got murdered and you're confortable lving here?
---
Nabella: I don't know, this place kinda grows on me.
---
Nabella: At first I didn't really like it, but after a few weeks here. I think this is a confortable place to be in.
---
Nabella: I do hope you find the murderer though...
-> choices
name: story

commands_raw:
Nabella: No, the owner is the old lady above the counter.
---
name: owner
choices

commands_raw:
Dalian: According to Belethara you did not clean the victims room today. 
---
Nabella: I was busy in the upper floor, it was quite a mess, Marchosias made it much worse than usual.
signal(set,NabellaSaidMarchoCanConfirm,true)
---
Nabella: You can ask him for clarification...
---
Nabella: Now I'm currently cleaning the middle floor, and I will clean the lower floor after that
-> choices
name: Beleth

commands_raw:
Nabella: Cleaning.
---
Nabella: What else does a maid really do.
---
Nabella: There was also one more thing.
---
Nabella: Yesterday I heard footsteps in upper floor. I did not see who it was, but I think it was Marchosias.
signal(set,nabellaHearFootsteps,true)

name: yesterday
